LightningComponentBundle.description: Display a record type selection on a screen

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API Name of the Object for which to display Record Types available to the User

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Label to display above the selection. Defaults to 'Select a Record Type'

property.name: autoNavigateNext
property.label: Automatic Next on Select
property.description: Set to TRUE if you want to automatically navigate Next when the user makes a selection. Defaults to FALSE

property.name: showDescription
property.label: Show Descriptions
property.description: Set to TRUE to display each Record Type's Description

property.name: displayType
property.label: Display Type
property.description: Choose how to display the Record Type Picker: picker, radio, or picklist. Defaults to picker
